[Like us on Facebook](https://www.facebook.com/greencloudvps)
[Follow us on Twitter](https://twitter.com/GreenCloudVPS)

![](https://greencloudvps.com/greencloudvps/wp-content/uploads/2021/07/ryzen.png "")

Finally our Ryzen nodes are live in Chicago, IL; Jacksonville, FL; Amsterdam, NL and the most desired location: Singapore!

**Node specs:**

- Ryzen 3950x in Chicago, Ryzen Threadripper™ 3960x in Jacksonville, FL; Amsterdam, NL and Singapore
- 10Gbps Port
- Enterprise NVMe in RAID-1
- DDR4 ECC @2666 Mhz

To celebrate these new locations, we have doubled the NVMe and lowered the normal price at -60% rate.

**Ryzen10Gbps-1 - $20/year** 

    - 1024MB RAM
    - 1 core
    - 30GB NVMe RAID-1
    - IPv4: 1
    - IPv6: /112
    - Network: 10Gbps
    - 2TB Bandwidth (1TB in SG)
    - Linux OS
    - SolusVM Control Panel
    - Locations: Chicago, IL; Jacksonville, FL; Amsterdam, NL; Singapore

- [ORDER IL](https://greencloudvps.com/billing/cart.php?a=add&pid=618 "ORDER IL")
- [ORDER FL](https://greencloudvps.com/billing/cart.php?a=add&pid=623 "ORDER FL")
- [ORDER NL](https://greencloudvps.com/billing/cart.php?a=add&pid=625 "ORDER NL")
- [ORDER SG](https://greencloudvps.com/billing/cart.php?a=add&pid=621 "ORDER SG")
